
= GCS Features =

Main feature differences from earlier version:
  * log file - navigation and attitude data
  * kml log file - kml data showing flight path and waypoints
  * voice synthesis 


  == General ==

http://ardupilotgcs.googlecode.com/svn/images/GCSfgeneral.jpg

  # STOP button - use to exst GCS application.
  # Communication Status - indicates if GCS can communicate with ArduPilot. Red means no communication; Green - communication established
  # Message Box 1 - various status messages
  # Tabs - click on them to access various ArduPilot data or GCS settings
  # Battery, Throttle, and IMU health indicators
  # Message Box 2 - various information ( flight mode, etc.)
  # Navigation Display - waypoint, distance to waypoint, and plane's latitude and longitude information
  # Google Earth map - displays map with plane location and flight path
